name: Earl K. Long Medical Center Reviews

review.title: “I just wish it could last”
review.pros: Pros – I loved this job, this place and the people who worked there and who were patients there. A family of workers. Loyal patients.
review.cons: Cons – Due to pending budget cuts it is scheduled to close.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Welcome to the community. Most of you will be out of work soon.

review.title: “Don't work here”
review.pros: Pros – none-expectations of organization for amount of work SOME nurses do is too high. Due to budget issues the few financial perks that were offered are gone (changes to retirement, closing of hospital, treating loyal employees like garbage).
review.cons: Cons – Cliquish, political, back biting....this institution will not be around much longer due to state politics/budget
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Get new ones
